articles.description: LOS ANGELES: Hollywood's film academy on Friday (Apr 8) banned Will Smith from attending the Oscars for 10 years after the best actor winner slapped presenter Chris Rock on stag
articles.content: The group did not say, however, that he would be ineligible to be nominated for Oscars during that time. Smith's next movie, action thriller Emancipation, about a man who escapes from slavery, had be… [+2063 chars]
